entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Coronation
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:31 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Coronation 11:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023
Temperature: -12.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -15.5°C
Wind: ESE 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy near noon then snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to light snow after midnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023
